Tour of the French Riviera from Monaco to Cannes, 21 April 2003

---Part of the Monaco Palace where Prince Raninier III has ruled since 1949. The palace was built in the 13th century and restructured during the Renaissance.---
---The start of the formal changing of the guard which takes place every weekday at 12:55pm.---
---Because I was in a wheelchair, a guard moved us up to the front row, outside the ropes, so we could REALLY see!---

---Up close and personal scenes---
